actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means

official_title: A bill to repeal the changes made by the Tax Reform Act of 1984 in the tax treatment of seller-financed property transactions.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to repeal rules relating to the determination of the issue price of certain debt instruments issued for property. Amends the Tax Reform Act of 1984 to repeal the revisions made to rules for the imputation of interest on certain deferred payments.

titles.title: A bill to repeal the changes made by the Tax Reform Act of 1984 in the tax treatment of seller-financed property transactions.
